Record.ClassificationPath: Digestive System Diseases/Gastrointestinal Diseases/Esophageal Diseases/Deglutition Disorders/Esophageal Motility Disorders/Esophageal Achalasia
Record.Description: A motility disorder of the ESOPHAGUS in which the LOWER ESOPHAGEAL SPHINCTER (near the CARDIA) fails to relax resulting in functional obstruction of the esophagus, and DYSPHAGIA. Achalasia is characterized by a grossly contorted and dilated esophagus (megaesophagus).
